SEARCH
Package catan.ceng.catanui.service

Class RequestService

java.lang.Object
catan.ceng.catanui.service.RequestService
@Service public class RequestService extends Object
This service class handles HTTP requests to a RESTful API for user login using the OkHttpClient library. It sends a POST request with JSON data to the specified URL and handles the response.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public Boolean login(Player player)
      Attempts to log in a player by sending a POST request to the login API.
      Parameters:
      player - The player object containing username and password for login.
      Returns:
      True if the login is successful, false otherwise, or null in case of an exception.

    • register

      public Boolean register(Player player)
      Attempts to register a new player by sending a POST request to the registration API.
      Parameters:
      player - The player object containing username, email, and password for registration.
      Returns:
      True if the registration is successful, false otherwise, or null in case of an exception.

    • sendResetEmail

      public Boolean sendResetEmail(String email)
      Sends a request to reset the user's password by sending a POST request to the reset password API.
      Parameters:
      email - The email address of the user for password reset.
      Returns:
      True if the reset email is sent successfully, false otherwise, or false in case of an exception.

    • resetPassword

      public Boolean resetPassword(String token, String newPassword)
      Sends a request to reset the user's password by sending a POST request to the reset password API.
      Parameters:
      token - The token received in the password reset email.
      newPassword - The new password to be set.
      Returns:
      True if the password is reset successfully, false otherwise, or false in case of an exception.

    • getScoreboard

      public String getScoreboard(String time)
      Retrieves the scoreboard data from the server based on the specified time frame.
      Parameters:
      time - The time frame for which the scoreboard data should be retrieved (e.g., "weekly" or "monthly").
      Returns:
      A JSON string representing the scoreboard data if successful, or null in case of an exception.

    • addScore

      public void addScore(String userName, String score)
      Sends a request to add a new score to the server.
      Parameters:
      userName - The name of the user who achieved the score.
      score - The score achieved by the user.
